Ingredients.1: 1 bunch asparagus, trimmed and snapped into pieces

Ingredients.2: 1 teaspoon olive oil, or as needed

Ingredients.3: 1 salt and black pepper to taste

Ingredients.5: 1 (14 ounce) prebaked pizza crust (such as Boboli®)

Directions.1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place asparagus on a baking sheet; drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.

Directions.3: Bake the asparagus in the preheated oven for 10 minutes.

Directions.4: While asparagus is baking, spread the pizza sauce over the pizza crust. Distribute asparagus pieces and crumbles of blue cheese evenly over the pizza.

Directions.5: Return pizza to center rack of preheated oven; bake until the cheese is melted and bubbling, 8 to 10 more minutes.
